appearances.title: House Democratic Leaders Hold Briefing on Legislative Agenda : CSPAN : January 8, 2026 3:54am-4:22am EST
appearances.snippet: district is adjacent to some of the affected areas as well, but i really appreciate the work of george whitesides and judy chuu have done in representing their communities. i think americans, not just in california but americans all across this country should be shocked. and they should be saddened that the trump administration is viewing disaster assistance as a red state and a blue state issue. and that's exactly what they're doing. the vice chair and i have been part of efforts, bipartisan efforts, with other california republicans in order to send letters to the administration and let them know what's at steak and what california needs. california should not be treated unlike texas and north carolina when it comes to floods and disasters. we're one country, and that's how we should be treated. this president doesn't believe in that. this president doesn't believe in treating blue states the same as red states when it comes to natural disasters. and it's a terrible precedent to set, and house republicans and many of our republican colleagues seem content with that, and that's deeply frustratin
